panels.title: Committed Version
panels.description: Version of the latest ledger info committed. Any synced transactions beyond this version will not be considered committed

panels.title: Synced Version
panels.description: The version of the latest transaction synced

panels.title: Epoch
panels.description: Epoch of local state

panels.title: Active Upstream Peers
panels.description: Number of peers that are currently active and upstream. They are the set of nodes a node can make sync requests to

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, network) (aptos_state_sync_active_upstream_peers{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Failed Storage Read
panels.description: rate of storage read failures

panels.title: Failed Network Sends
panels.description: rate of number of times a aptosNet network send failed

targets.expr: rate(aptos_state_sync_requests_sent_total{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", result="fail", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) + rate(aptos_state_sync_responses_sent_total{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", result="fail", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Failed channel sends
panels.description: rate of number of times a channel send failed

panels.title: Commit Flow Failures
panels.description: rate of failures encountered in the commit flow across consensus, state sync, and mempool

panels.title: Reconfig Notification Failure
panels.description: rate of number of times a reconfig notification failed to happen

panels.title: Chunk Responses Received from Downstream
panels.description: rate of chunk responses received from a downstream peer

panels.title: Msgs Received
panels.description: number of requests (e.g. commit, sync) received from consensus

panels.title: Sync Requests Completed
panels.description: number of sync requests from consensus completed

panels.title: Failed Sync Requests
panels.description: rate of sync requests (from consensus) that did not succeed (e.g. failed, timed out)

panels.title: Msgs Received
panels.description: number of requests (e.g. commit, sync) received from consensus

panels.title: Sync Requests Completed Rate
panels.description: number of sync requests from consensus completed

panels.title: Process Sync Msg Latency
panels.description: latency of processing sync msg from consensus

targets.expr: rate(aptos_state_sync_coordinator_msg_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="sync", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_state_sync_coordinator_msg_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="sync", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Consensus Commit Fail
panels.description: rate of number of times a commit msg from consensus failed to be processed

panels.title: Process Commit Msg Latency
panels.description: Latency of processing commit msg from consensus

panels.title: Apply Chunk Success
panels.description: number of times a chunk was successfully applied to local state

panels.title: Apply Chunk Failure
panels.description: number of times a received chunk failed to be applied to local state

panels.title: Target Version
panels.description: A version a node is trying to sync up to

panels.title: Apply Chunk Success Rate
panels.description: number of times a chunk was successfully applied to local state

panels.title: Apply Chunk Failure Rate
panels.description: number of times a received chunk failed to be applied to local state

panels.title: Transaction Replayed
panels.description: number of transactions state synchronizer has retrieved since last restart

panels.title: Chunk E2E Latency
panels.description: How long it took to sync a chunk, from requesting a chunk to fully processing and executing it

panels.title: Chunk Size
panels.description: number of txns in a chunk

panels.title: Transaction Replayed Rate
panels.description: number of transactions state synchronizer has retrieved since last restart

panels.title: Execute/Commit Chunk Latency
panels.description: time it takes to execute and commit a chunk (via executor proxy)

panels.title: Requests Sent Rate
panels.description: rate of number of chunk requests sent

panels.title: Chunk Response Received Rate
panels.description: rate of number of chunk responses received

panels.title: Multicast Level
panels.description: number of networks the node is sending chunk requests to. =0 if the primary upstream network is healthy, else >0

panels.title: Process Chunk Request Success Rate
panels.description: rate of number of times a node successfully processed a chunk request

panels.title: Process Chunk Request Failure Rate
panels.description: rate of number of times this node failed to process an incoming chunk request

panels.title: Average Chunk Response Process Latency
panels.description: time it takes to process a chunk response

targets.expr: rate(aptos_state_sync_process_msg_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="chunk_response", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_state_sync_process_msg_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="chunk_response", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Average Chunk Request Process Latency
panels.description: time it takes to process a chunk request

targets.expr: rate(aptos_state_sync_process_msg_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="chunk_request", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_state_sync_process_msg_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", type="chunk_request", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Subscription Delivery Rate
panels.description: rate of number of times a FN long-poll subscription was delivered (does not include times where the initial FN chunk request was immediately responded to)

panels.title: Sent Chunk Request Timeout Rate
panels.description: rate of times a node's sent chunk request timed out
